entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6 except temperature steady near minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 except temperature steady near minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
